They were the world’s most famous monsters...forced into hiding for years... CUT TO CLIPS of Frankenstein, Murray, Wayne and Griffin, out and about in a public setting, ex. red carpets.
But now they’re out of the closet and all over ET! MURRAY being interviewed at a red carpet event.

Yeah, once I started getting offers, hitting the fashion world felt right. A gay LATINO MAN stands next to a MODEL in a CHIFFON PART DRESS. MURRAY critiques from his chair on a panel. MURRAY (CONT’D) I like where you’re going with this, Cicero - but it feels like it needs bandages. Y’hearing me, bro? Make a statement, y’all. Bandage that sucker. CICERO nods emotionally as the crowd cheers. Cicero quick pulls off the dress, tears the fabric and wraps it around model mummy-style. GRIFFIN being interviewed at a different red carpet event

4... 3... 2... and 1! Do you feel it right here? Good! Now bring it back. 8...7...6...5...  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 2. FRANKENSTEIN and BIGFOOT being interviewed at a different carpet event.
Yeah, Bigfoot here’s tearing it up in the Italian Soccer League.

As we hear an ANNOUNCER scream in Italian, A SOCCER PLAYE charges downfield and takes a shot. BIGFOOT’S right foot blocking the entire net. The ball bounces off his foot, another PLAYER kicks the rebound but the foot blocks it again. The crowd and announcer go nuts. CUT BACK TO: FRANKENSTEIN at the same red carpet event. FRANKENSTEIN (CONT’D) Count Dracula? Nah, he never does this public stuff. Drac’s old school. He’s about family. And his hotel.
DRACULA is barking orders to a row of ZOMBIES, readjustin their bowties and eyeballs (similar to the cut scene from first movie). A sparse number of MONSTER GUESTS circulate

The place doesn’t get as many monsters as when we were in hiding, but it’s still got the best food. Dracula samples a squirrel head on a toothpick and gives approval to the GARGOYLE, who is now head chef.
Mmm, getting better. Gargoyle smiles awkwardly.
Is that your happy face? Gargoyle nods.
Don't ever do that again. INT. MAVIS’ BEDROOM - DAY Dracula playing Mavis’ music box.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 3.
I think he misses his daughter. Drac is sitting on Mavis’ coffin sadly.
She's been off traveling with Johnny, her human boyfriend, for a few months. Wayne and Wanda burst in.
Drac, what are you doing?
Whaa -? I’m just keeping her bed nice and cold for when she comes back.
Mmm hmm, your skinny butt gonna be there a long time.
Drac, Mavis says she’s been trying to call you!
Call me? Oh! «Ha! See that? My skinny butt’s waited long enough! She's coming back! Wayne pulls out his smartphone.
You gotta get one of these. She wants to video chat.
Video? Whatever happened to turning into a bat and flying to someone? Mavis appears on Wayne’s phone with Johnny. Wayne and Wan peek behind him to get a look.
Hey, Dad!
Mavy Wavy! Where are you?
HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 4.
We're in Guacamole!
Guatemala. Hey Drac! Love you!
Yes, great, Johnny. Also with the love. So when you coming back? Dracula pushes Wayne aside.
Sorry, can’t handle your breath.
I hear you.
I mean, right over my shoulder...
And, Dad... I’m engaged!
Fantastic. And then you're coming back?
Dad, did youshear what I said? I’m getting married. To Johnny! Mavis holds up an ENGAGEMENT RING!
Oh, Mavis, that ring is gorgeous!!
Thank you Wanda!
No one’s answered my question. Are you coming back?
Yes. We can’t wait to see you guys!
Holy rabies!!
(teary-eyed) We're all gonna be related!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 5.
She's coming back!!!
MONSTERS and HUMANS in formal wear pour into the lobby...

Her MAID OF HONOR is the SHRUNKEN HEAD, strung to a coathanger with a bridesmaid dress, hung on a small coat rack.,The Sisters look uncomfortable. FLASH EFFECT to STILL PHOTO of the group. She fixes his hair for him and he gives a tense, wooden smile. FLASH EFFECT to STILL PHOTO - Drac and Mavi are invisible.

Johnny at the alter with his backpack next to him, holdin the ring. Coming up the aisle are BRETT and KELSEY. The Humans are stunned but the Monsters again say “Awwww.” Johnny and Mavis at the alter, married. Dracula is teary as he looks at Mavis and remembers her as a child. Johnny and Mavis slowly move in for the big kiss...Dracula tries can’t take it and, using telepathy from his hand, flies t Shrunken Head in between them just as Johnny kisses her. text: HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 7. Mavis runs from Johnny and hugs Dracula, teary eyed. Othe monsters tear up, including Bigfoot, whose giant tear fal on Grandma Linda, soaking her entire body.
INT. MAVIS AND JOHNNY’S BEDROOM - ONE YEAR LATER Johnny is still singing, this time to Mavis’ pregnant bel
I’m hungry again, honey. Can you get me some ice cream with anchovies? Dracula swoops in.

No, no no. You mustn’t give in to your cravings! It’s not good for the baby! He produces a manual “WHAT TO EXPECT WHEN YOU’RE EXPECTIN VAMPIRE” and reads from it. ZOMBIE WAITERS present the di as Dracula mentions them.
You need to increase your spider intake, so he’ll be able to climb ceilings properly. And eat lots of goat bile.
I love you, Dad, but we don’t even know if the kid’s gonna be a vampire! I’d be thrilled if the baby’s humany just like Johnny!

Humany? With thousands of years of Dracula genes? Not gonna happen! Here! Just have some monster ball soup. It’s your Mommy’s recipe. Dracula produces a tray of soup with balls of monster fac gurgling in it. Mavis smiles, weakening - she loves her s
Aww...thank you Dad.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 8. She takes her spoon to eat it and one of the Monster Ball devours the spoon.
Sorry.

Dracula excitedly walks to a gothic CALENDAR with a Baby Vampire on each month. He marks off another day with an x Calendar SHUFFLES through months, as different Baby Vampi are seen. Finally land on a month with a bunch of X’s leading up a day marked THE BIG NIGHT.
Dracula is at the door of the Delivery Room where Mavis i about to give birth. The MONSTER DOCTOR intercepts him.
Sir, only the father is allowed until after the baby’s born.
Of course! He’s the family, makes sense to me!
The BABY is just born, crying and the MONSTER DOCTOR is a to hand it to Mavis as Johnny holds her. Suddenly, an odd looking NURSE. takes.the baby instead and holds it.
(bad woman's voice) Oh, look! It’s a boy! It’s a boy! The Dracula bloodline carries on! (Dracula dark voice) No one will ever harm you as long as I’m here.
Dad? Clearly it’s Dracula in the nurse’s outfit wearing a mask
(bad woman's voice) No, no! It’s the nurse! I don’t know who Dad is.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 9.
Dad, can I hold my baby?
(handing it to her) If I were Dad, I’d say yes, but I’m the nurse. Francine. A ZOMBIE ORDERLY sprays Binaca into his mouth and grunts flirtatiously and leans in to kiss Dracula.
(regular voice) Back off! The Zombie Orderly recoils.

JOHNNY AND MAVIS’ HOTEL SUITE - SIX MONTHS LATER The baby, DENNIS, is now a year old with goofy red hair. Johnny’s parents, Grampa Mike and,Grandma Linda are still present, and Frank, Eunice, Murray, Griffin, Wayne and Wa are there with gifts. Johnny is in between Dracula and Mi JOHNNY. Can’t believe Dennis is a year old already!
Is this_a handsome kid or what? Look at that red hair!
(singsongy) I don’t think it’s going to stay red...
I think it is...
(singsongy) I think I see some black roots...
I don’t think I do...
(singsongy) I have vampire vision... I can see it...  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 10. Johnny shares a troubled look with Mavis.
Okay. Please, you two, I don’t want him to hear his grandpas arguing. His hair doesn’t matter, right?
Of course not. He’s perfect whatever color-haired vampire he is.
What if he’s not a vampire? He doesn’t have fangs.
(singsongy) I think they’re growing in...you have until you’re five to get your vampire fangs.
Well, if he doesn’t, maybe he’d be better off growing up in a place with more humans.
Oh, that won’t happen! He’1ll get his fangs! (regaining his cool) Right, little Denisovich?
His name is Dennis... named after my father.
(singsongy) It’s not his vampire name... my wittle Denisovichy-Weesovichy...
(aside) Wow. Is this behavior getting you sick, too?
Uh, you can’t see me rolling my eyes right now?
No.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 11.
Oh. Well, I’m rolling my eyes right now. Grampa Mike repeatedly tosses a small BASEBALL to indiffe Dennis as Dracula counters by tossing him a tiny TROLL.
Okay! So, anyway...too bad you guys have to get back to Santa Cruz.
I don’t know why you're not coming back with us. Don’t you need to get a real job, son?
A real job...?
Ehh...Johnny already has a real job.
I do? I mean, I do. I mean. - what do I mean?

Yes, Johnny’s in charge of, uh... making the hotel more human- friendly. Yes. Here. Staying here. Not leaving. Dennis is now putting the ball in his mouth, pleasing Mik As dialogue continues, Dracula hands Dennis the troll, wh Dennis puts in his mouth to Drac’s delight.
Oh. So, this this place isn’t just for monsters anymore?
Uh...you could say that --
Yeah, it’s gonna be awesome. Humans and monsters, sharing the same towels and spoons. It’s a huge step for man and monsterkind!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 12.
That’s adorable. When Johnny was younger he had his iguana share a cage with his parakeet. Hope this ends better!
Gonna rock it for you, Drac! Don’t stop believin’!
Okay! Time for presents!
Alright, let’s do this boy up! Check out what I got him - bling!
Wow, is it cursed?

Super-cursed! Only the best. Straight from the cryptl Drac puts Dennis on the ground... JOHNNY. Uh, he’s just starting to walk, so maybe it’s heavier than -- Murray puts a huge gold necklace on him. Dennis wobbles a takes half a step and falls, crying. Mavis grabs him as Murray frowns.
Okay! Okay! I’m sorry, Uncle Murray. I don’t think he’s ready for this.
Okay, alright, you’re the mama.
Okay, anybody... else? Frank and Eunice are somewhat reluctant. Dracula unwraps
I hope it’s acceptable... A small “My First Guillotine”. Frank demonstrates...  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 13.
“My First Guillotine”! Very educational! Well played, Frank! Linda gulps. Mavis grabs it just before Drac hands it to Dennis.

It’s great! Thank you! We just have to babyproof it. Mavis hands Dennis to Johnny and walks around looking for some rubber guards. Reveal everything is babyproofed, the are gates everywhere, guards on all the toys, and long ra on Dennis’ coffin/bed. MAVIS (CONT’D) Johnny do you know where you put the rubber guards?
(embarrassed) I’1l1 look honey. Johnny hands Dennis to Dracula.
Now guillotines are dangerous?
She made me do this to the whole hotel. (singsongy ) Control freak...

In the hotel lobby, Zombie Bellmen are babyproofing Suits Armor's SPEARS with soft guards. A TRAP DOOR getting a baby lock from MR. GHOULIGAN. WITCH MAIDS lined up. Zombie Bellman puts soft guards on their pointy NOSES. In a classic MAD SCIENTIST LABORATORY with electric wires tubes we follow a ZOMBIE carrying something past a giant electric cable to a GIANT WALL SOCKET. He plugs a giant PLASTIC BABYPROOF PLUG into vacant socket.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 14. In a BATHROOM a MONSTER GUEST struggles to lift a babypro TOILET SEAT and rips the toilet out, shooting water. The Monster Guest tries to use it anyway. TRANSITION: VAMPIRE GROWTH CHART indicates the boy has gr a few inches. JOHNNY AND MAVIS’ HOTEL SUITE - SEVEN MONTHS LATER
Johnny! Come quick! Johnny is rushing in with Dracula.
What’s up? He’s okay? Mavis is holding Dennis, over a year old, with curly red hair.
Dennis said his first word!
He did!?
Come on, honey - say it again.
Bleh, bleh-bleh! Dracula is stunned.
I don’t say bleh, bleh-bleh!
We didn’t say you did!
Then where did he get that?
Bleh, bleh-bleh!
Well, maybe sometimes you say it...
I only say it when I say I don’t say it!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 15.
Bleh, bleh-bleh!
Okay, kid, we get it. You can talk. (softening) Denisovich! He sneaks a peek for fangs.
Dad...
Just checking for cavities. Drac leaves. Mavis playfully turns to Dennis.
(imitating Dracula) Mavey Wavey!
(giggling) Ma-ey Wa-ey! Dennis giggles. Dracula zips back in to say:
It was you!!!
INT. DENNIS’ BEDROOM - ONE YEAR LATER Dennis is now 2, )still no fangs. Just a goofy looking ha kid with a curly red afro. Dracula has snuck in through t window in bat form...
Denisovich!
Bat? Dracula turns into himself. He whispers to Dennis.
It’s Papa Drac! Cool, huh? Now, look, I’m turning into a bat again! He turns into a bat.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 16.
Cool!
Yes! Cool, like I said! Now, you try! Dennis play acts turning into a bat and flaps around.
I’m a bat!!
Uh, I mean a real bat -
I’m a bat! (making buck teeth) Fneeee! !
Denisovich...take a breath. You can really turn into a bat. Start with an arm.
What?
(trying to stay smiley) Just focus! Try! Feel the bat! Dennis moves one arm around, confused.
Come on, let’s see one wing! Dennis starts to cry.
No, no, no, shh! Look! Dennis is scared. Dracula lifts him up.
Look! You're flying! Fun!
(crying more) NO! Scared!
Okay, okay, please stop crying!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 17. Dracula puts Dennis on a table.
Look! Look at me! Dracula flies into the wall, crashing. Dennis still cryin
Look! I’m flying into the wall! Dracula crashes and hurts himself repeatedly. Finally Den laughs! Dracula keeps crashing.
Ahh, yes! It’s funny! Dennis’ laughing makes him fall off the table. He cries louder than ever. Dracula panics. He grabs a vase and sma it into his head. We hear a laugh. Dracula sighs, relieve
EXT. HOTEL TRANSYLVANIA —- PRESENT, DAY — SUNSET
A mix of hearses and conventional»cars line the entrance.

As we enter the hustling and bustling lobby we now see ne as many S as MONSTER GUESTS, all dressed vacationy. The l looks the same except a little more hi-tech, there is a s up VIDEO DISPLAY highlighting activities available. Dracula peeks into the dining area and two grumpy AQUATIC LOOKING MONSTERS, MR. and MRS. GILL.
How you folks doing tonight?
Count Dracula! What’s with this food? Cooked steak!? Who would do that to steak?

I'm sorry, Mr. Gill, You must have gotten a human dish. He quickly grabs Mr. Gill’s dish and spots a HUMAN COUPLE struggling with a plate of food that is biting them.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 18.
I believe this is yours, Mr. Perry.
Yes, the steak. What’s this food? It’s biting us!
Yes, that’s the tasting menu. Sorry. Dracula takes the tasting menu dish and gives it to the Gills. Johnny approaches him.
Drac, gotta say, humans are comin’ and everybody's digging the new activities... They walk past a “spinning class” (spider themed).
Check out the spinning class...
If that’s what people are into... Johnny leads him into the new TV ROOM. Monsters and human alike are watching a football game on one monitor. Johnny watches with pride as Drac forces a smile.
And I told you they’d flip for the TV room! On the other monitor, the GHOSTBUSTERS are fighting ghost The s laugh, but»the monsters scream in horror.
Oh, my! I hope there aren’t any kids watching.
On it. Johnny tends to some scared young monsters and is berated their MOTHER.

(thinks ) What kind of a place shows Kids... that to children? Innocent oh, it’s 8 pm already! ghosts being busted? You Denisovich is up! should be ashamed!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 19. INT. DENNIS’ BEDROOM - NIGHT Dracula sneaks in and watches sleeping four year-old Denn small for his age, still goofy looking with curly red hai Dennis wakes up.
Rise and shine, my Denisovich!
Hi Papa.
Hello, my little devil! Did you have sweet nightmares?
Uh huh... I dreamed that I saw... that I saw... I dreamed that I saw an Stegosaurus.
Oh, and were you drinking, his blood?
No.
Just throwing it out there. As Dennis continues Dracula peeks and pokes in his mouth, takes out a fang ruler, measures, marks progress in noteb

And he said that, he said Uh huh.... that he had a spiked tail cebause he lived in tropical Uh huh... You don’t say... climates... and cebause he lived in, in the Jurassic Long time ago... yes... period. Mavis enters.
Dad! Why did you wake him up?
What do you mean? It’s after 8!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 20.

I know, Dad, but don’t you remember the new sleep schedule? He’s going to human classes half the day. She indicates a very complicated SLEEP SCHEDULE on the wa MAVIS (CONT’D) If he could just sleep till 2 am tonight it’d be so great for him.
But Honeydeath, why not take classes with the wolfpups here aat the hotel?! They play fun games like musical chairs!
The pups are destroying a circle of chairs as gentle MUSI plays. Some smash chairs over each others’ heads. INT. DENNIS’ BEDROOM - NIGHT
Dad, I love the wolfpups, but I just think Dennis needs to be around some kids like him. Okay, Dad? (singing to Dennis) Twinkle, twinkle little star, how I wonder what you are...
(groggy) Mommy, I’m too old for lullaby...
(not listening to him) What? That’s not how that one goes.
This is the way most people sing it.
Most people? What’s wrong with (singing) “Suffer, suffer, scream in pain, Blood is spilling from your brain”?
Daddy...  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 21.
Come on, you know how I sang it to you... (singing) Zombies
(harmonizing beautifully) gnaw you like a plum, piercing cries, and you succumb. Dennis is fast asleep.
“Suffer, suffer, scream in pain, you will never breathe again.” Still works. He looks to Mavey but she’s asleep. Drac smiles proudly.

The Human Fly, a Zombie Clerk, andya GROTESQUE MONSTER al the FRONT DESK. They are ignoring the phone and enjoying photoboothy APP the Grotesque Monster is playing with on SMARTPHONE. It distorts his own face.
Oh, my goodness, Leonard! If you really looked. that hideous, I don’t think I could hang out with you!! They crack up laughing as Dracula enters and admonishes t
Guys! What's the deal? Is this a party? Pick up a phone! The Human Fly hustles to the phone and answers it.
Grrrnnnhhh..!

I don’t care if it’s a “cool app”! Now Porridge Head, did you call a hearse for the Gremlinbergs? PORRIDGE HEAD is working on a desktop computer. Dracula looks at his screen, revealing a profile page with every interest listed as “Brains”:  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 22.
No! You’re checking your Facebook page! Again! Johnny and the AV NERD ZOMBIE enter.
Drac, you need social media to promote the hotel. Right, Clifton?
(nerdly voice) Mnnnrrrgghhhh....
So, Drac, I wanted to go through some thoughts I had as your human relations coordinating co- assistant.
Sure, of course. It’s a real job. Not a cheap excuse to guarantee Mavis and Denisovich staying here.
Right...so I was thinking. Since we have so many humans now, maybe, some human staff...?
What? No, no, I’m not taking jobs away from monsters. We’re accepted but we have a long way to go.
I know, I’m just thinking about a couple of places. Like, maybe the lounge act? The magician?
What’s wrong with Harry Three-Eye?
I don’t think the humans dig it.

Humans and Monsters watch HARRY THREE-EYE, a three-eyed grotesque magician with wings and tentacles with teeth co out of his head.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 23. He wears a tux jacket, bow tie and a small goatee. His ASSISTANT is another grotesque monster with a platinum wi A MONSTER VOLUNTEER stands on stage.
Tell me, sir, what was your card?
The three of spades. Harry Three-Eye reaches into the Monster Volunteer’s body cavity and pulls out the three of spades, sitting on his stomach.

Is this your card, my friend? The Monster guests in the lounge applaud politely, but hu are horrified. The Monster Volunteer nods to Harry, like “you're good”. Harry smugly accepts the sparse applause.
No. Harry’s great. Can’t blame Harry for the crowd not»being hip.
Okay...what about Wayne?
Are you nuts? He’s my boy!
Maybe something other than tennis?
He’s very knowledgable!
That’s not the problem.
Wayne, in tennis whites, is instructing a male .

Okay, so what you want to do is lift the racquet right on impact, so you get that nice topspin. Try and hit one.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 24. The bounces and hits the ball with his racquet. Wayne instinctively starts to BARK and wildly chases the ball across the court, derailing the lesson. Finally catches t ball and then furiously digs a hole in the clay court.
Dracula’s cell phone rings, startling him.
What is that? What’s the noise? It’s on me! He starts swatting at himself.
It’s just the cell phone I got you. Clifton’s sending you a text, so you can practice how to write back. Drac tries to press the right button to answer but with h long fingernails it’s very hard.
Ehh... gehhh... it’s not doing it! JOHNNY. I got it... Johnny finds the text.
(xveading) “Dear Drac - Ggnnnnggrrrggh.” Now you._can text Clifton.
Alright, fine! He tries to text but his nails are impossible.
Gah! How do you do this?
It’s easy. Look, I'll text Mavis. (texting) “Psyched for Date Night.” See? And now look. She texted right back. “Gotta cancel. Can’t leave Dennis.” (texting) (MORE )
HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 25.
“Are we...never allowed...to be alone again? I need...to feel... loved too.” And... send!
O-kay. All that taught me is that you're pathetic.
Yeah. Got it. Maybe you should just get Bluetooth.
Okay. Bluetooth, come over here! BLUETOOTH, a giant blue tooth, hops over with a boing sou
So now what?
All is quiet. INT. DRAC’S ROOM - LATER Dracula has taken off his shirt and is picking out pajama

(muttering, mocking Johnny) Hey Dude-man, you need Bluetooth! Hey Dude-man, let’s fire your friends! Hey Dude-man, I’m a Dude- man! The Shrunken Head in his room call over. DRAC’S SHRUNKEN HEAD Yo Dummy! Don’t you remember why you gave him this fake job?

Yes! To keep them here! Dracula gargles with blood mouthwash as the Shrunken Head speaks. DRAC’S SHRUNKEN HEAD That's right! And what he’s doing’s actually making your daughter want to stay here too. (MORE )
HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 26. DRAC’S SHRUNKEN HEAD (CONT'D) Seein’ that your grandboy ain’t a monster or nothing.
He is a monster! He’s just a late fanger. DRAC’S SHRUNKEN HEAD Mmm hmm. And I could be a hand model. Yo - kid turns five ina week. And you know that if he’s not a vampire by then, it ain’t happening.

Oh, it ain’t ain’t happening, baby. DRAC’S SHRUNKEN HEAD Yeah, well if I was you, I’d let that Johnny humanifize the heaven outta this place. So maybe you got a fightin’ chance of keeping that little dimple-butt heresinstead of moving to that crazy suburbia everyone talks about. At “suburbia” Dracula looks stunned. He immediately spins rapidly and emerges in his regular full outfit. DRAC’S SHRUNKEN HEAD (CONT’D) What you doing? I thought you were going to sleep!
There’s no time! I gotta fix this!

setting up some lights and handing Mavis a frisbee.
You say this place is better than that mini-mart place?

Oh, yeah. Nothin’ beats my old frolf course - frisbee golf to the layman. Yeah, I_set the club record here back in two thousand four -- Mavis tosses»the frisbee straight into the first basket. mind control, it» then flies to the next, and the next, a on until all mine have been hit. Johnny is stunned.
That was fun! Oh, hey, it’s after 3 in Transylvania - I’m gonna check on Dennis, okay?
(polite) Awesome.
Dennis is asleep on Dracula’s lap. Frankenstein is eating a large FRUIT ROLL-UP from Dennis’ snack bag.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 56.
Okay, so where next? How about the old inn where I became invisible?
Nah, that’s boring. With all due respect. Next stop is - Dracula’s phone rings.
Oh no...oh no...it’s Mavis!
You gotta answer it. Dracula is struggling with his fingernails again.
You're pushing too hard. Lighter!
All right! Who’s got Denisovich?
I got him! He puts sunglasses on the sleeping boy and holds him up.
Mavis sees a signal on her video chat and finally Dracula
Dad! What» took so long? INTERCUT with Dracula in the car. He holds the phone clos that Mavis can’t see he’s in a car.
What? Nothing, Mavy! We’re all great here. How are you?
Um, everything’s fine. Is Dennis okay?
Of course! You want to see him?

Yes! Yes I do!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 57. Dracula shows Mavis Dennis. MAVIS (CONT’D) Hi Baby! How are you? Griffin moves Dennis' arms, Weekend at Bernie's style, ma it appear he’s awake. Griffin also does Dennis’ voice.
Mommy! I happy!
I miss you! Why is he wearing sunglasses?
Oh, we were playing... it’s a superhero thing!
I’m a superhero!!
Oh, okay. Which one, honey!
Uh... Sunglasses Man!
Oh, ho... yow’re so cute.
Cebause I’m Sunglasses Man to the rescue! He makes Dennis look like he’s trying to fly.
(aside to Griffin) Okay, take it down a notch.
You sound funny.
That’s his Sunglasses Man voice He’s been doing it all night. (faking a bad signal) Chhhhh... the signal is bad.
Okay, Sunglasses Man, remember what every superhero eats to get strong!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 58.
Rolled oats with apricot!
Yay!
Chhhh...chhhhhh...Mavis are you there? Static...static...
Yeah, I’m still... Dracula disappears from the screen. He has hung up, fakin disconnect. MAVIS (CONT’D) Alright, I guess he’s having fun.
Course he is. She sighs with some relief.
Oh, yeah! Nailed it with the Sunglasses Man! Threw a cebause in there -
You gotta be kidding me. Now superheroes eat rolled oats?
If,it’s anything like this fruit rollup...
She looked happy up there, didn’t she? She’s gonna wanna move! We gotta fix this kid! Okay, so, next stop - Drac pulls out his cell phone again.
Someone turn on the navigator on this thing. Murray manipulates the navigator.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 59.
Look how light I touch it.
(creepy Peter Lorre voice) Please enter your destination! Pleeease! I’m begging you!
Johnny is waterskiing wildly, going up and down like a dolphin. The lake is lit up nicely from the MOON.
Whoa! Oh yeah! This is how I rolled every summer! They didn’t call me Weird Dolphin Guy for nothing!
Johnny now driving the boat.
Looking good out there. Mavis, in bat form, is on tiny waterskis with the rope ha in her mouth, flying and doing amazing flips.
Waterskiing’s so much fun!
Yeah. Not sure that’s technically waterskiing. We should hit my folks place, I,said we'd be there by now. Mavis switches back into human form.
Sure! Hey, Johnny...I gotta say, I love Santa Claus. What an awesome place to grow up. Imagine this for Dennis.
Oh...what? This? I don’t know about “awesome”. Maybe “tubular”...but not as awesome as the hotel. Mavis isn’t so sure.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 60.
Everyone is asleep except Dracula and Dennis, who are laughing, and Griffin, who drives.
Who has a bigger tushy, Frank or Murray?
Oh, boy, that’s a tough one. I’d say Frank's is bigger, but Murray’s may be mushier. Does that make sense?
Murray's tushy is mushy!
That’s my guess. Unless, who knows what’s under that wrapping, maybe it’s not be all tushy. Dennis laughs more.
Maybe there’s a large duck under there. Right next to his tushy. Dennis laughs, then quacks. The Navigator interrupts, in creepy, hyperexcited and tense Peter Lorre-ish voice.
Right turn! Now!! Here!! You imbecile! !
Oh, right! Turn, Griffin!
Yes, Papa Drac.
Yeah. This is gonna be good, Denisovich. Scary stuff. Wait and see fellas, this camp will bring the fangs out of anyone.
You have arrived at your destination!! Yes! YES!! Small TENTS are set up in the WOODS they are driving thou  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 61.
Here we are! Wake up, guys! It’s the Vampire Summer Camp I went to as a kid!
What’s it, Camp Vamp?
No! Who names their camp Camp Vamp? It's Camp Winnepacaca.
Our monsters are walking through the camp area. LITTLE VAMPIRE KIDS are everywhere, running and playing.
You see Denisovich, this is where I learned to catch mice, and shape shift, and use my incredible powers and strength! Pretty cool, huh?
Badminton! He excitedly points to a bunch of Vampire Kids playing BADMINTON. As Drac looks around, every activity appears harmless. Some kids are playing TETHERBALL, others are actually singing.
Yes. I don’t remember this badminting. Ah, come over this way! Dracula finds his.old BUNK and walks inside.
Check it out. This is the bunk I slept in! And look -- He walks over to a tiny COFFIN.
Denisovich! This is the coffin I would sleep in!
It’s small cebause you were small!
Yes!!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 62.
How do you know it’s yours? They all look the same.
This is the one. You know what they say, a vampire never forgets.
I thought that was an elephant. Suddenly the CAMP DIRECTOR, a younger, new age vampire wi gentle, voice, approaches.
Well, well, is this a night? How ya doin’ folks, I’m Dana, the director.
How are you?
We're sure excited to have all you legends visiting.
Can you believe it, Dracula says he found his old bunk!
Oh sure! He’s famous for that one! Dana shows them huge pee stain on old bunk. CAMP DIRECTOR (CONT’D) Yessir, that's a bigger landmark at camp than the flagpole. Dennis is laughing hysterically.
Papa Peepee!
Ha! Papa Peepee. That’s a keeper.
Oh, dear, we don't go for the nicknames here. Kids only get positive reinforcement. Now, what can we do you for?  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 63.
I'm very interested in sending my grandboy Denisovich here.
(puzzled but polite) Oh! This little... red headed... non-fangy lil’ guy?
Oh, they’re in there. He’s a late fanger. Can you show us some of the drills, like where they catch the mice?
Can do. Course, now we call it tee- mousing.
The Camp Director has brought them»allto a tee-ball versi of mice-eating. Mice are on a tee instead of being caught the wild. The kids run up one at a time and grab the mous
So they don’t have to catch the mice?
Nope. We find this is a good way to build their confidence. One kid is having trouble getting the mouse.
It’s right there! Kid grabs the mouse and runs off.
Hokey Pokey. Wanna mouse, Dennis?
Yeah!
Any allergies, color restrictions?
He can eat a mouse!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 64. A COUNSELOR brings out a big bowl of mice and the kids al reach into it and grab mice to eat.
Not too many! Remember, kids, a vampire always shares!
Shares. Again with the shares. Are you hearing this, fellas? Fellas? The other monsters are playing Badminton with Campers.
What? Yeah, sounds great! Frankenstein slams the birdie right in a KID’s face. Everyone laughs as Dracula steams.
Dracula sees a 200 feet tall rickety old diving tower.
Ah, there it is, Denisovich, where Papa learned to fly!
Ooh, I wanna fly! Pan to reveal the tower is guarded off.

Ah, yeah... we’re over here now. Vampire kids with instructors are lined up to jump off a foot high tower. All are wearing helmets and padding. Som jump off and retain the padding even when they turn to ba
Had to scale it down. Insurance. The last Vampire kid jumps and fails, swinging on the rop In background we hear:
Help me. Help me.
I'll get you down, Grigor. Dracula is silent and furious.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 65.
Ho-key Pokey. See ya at the campfire? EXT. JOHNNY'S PARENTS’ HOUSE - LATER THAT NIGHT A nice woodsy neighborhood in Northern California.
Grampa Mike and Grandma Linda are greeting Johnny and Mav
Well, gosh, welcome, you two. This is such a lovely surprise.
Well, I’ve always wanted to see Johnny’s home.
Well, here you are! Now, how does it work, are you up all»night, and sleep all day? Or can you join us for breakfast, like people would? JOHNNY. Yeah...Mavis...?
Oh, I’m gonna try and sleep tonight.

Good! Cuz I bought like the 150 sunblock for you... She produces a huge bottle of 150 SPF sunblock and a ponc GRANDMA LINDA (CONT’D) And I have a sunhat, but otherwise this poncho if you want to be safe.
We can figure that out in the morning, Linda.
Okay...ooh, listen...do you hear what we put on the stereo for you? “Thriller” is playing.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 66.
I’m sorry...that is...?
Linda, please don’t. Linda starts zombie-dancing as she sings along.
It's close to midnight, and something evil's lurking in the dark -- Mike, help me. Mavis smiles but looks at Johnny confused. Johnny cringes
Maybe that one’s before your time. Oh, wait, you’re a hundred twenty something!
I just never heard current music growing up in Transylvania.
Yeah. Transylvania. That was a fun experience. Mike was afraid he’d get eaten and I told him he was being silly. But, now, you just may fall in loveswith Santa Cruz.
Oh, I do love it! Johnny looks»stressed and makes an unintelligible sound.

Oh, and especially for little Dennis not being a monster and all, it’s very kid friendly. Doorbell rings. GRANDMA LINDA (CONT’D) Oh, there they are. You know, we have a couple of mixed families in the neighborhood, so I thought I'd invite them over. They might be nice for you guys to talk to.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 67.
Grandma Linda enters with two couples, CAREN and PANDRAGO who's a freaky-looking but chill monster with a Stoner ac
Hi, Caren, hi Pandragora.
Welcome, Mavis! As Pandragora speaks he casually grabs and eats flying insects.
Yeah, you're gonna dig it here! Don’t even worry, people are totally cool with the intermarriage thing.
Oh, Pandragora. (cheerful aside to Mavis) He does not read people very well. Not everybody is “totally cool”. The next couple walks in, LORETTA and PAUL, who’s super h with a scraggly beard.
Oh, hey yousguys! And this is Loretta, she’s married to Paul, who’s a werewolf.
Excuse me?
Yes. I was telling Mavis about the other monster/human couples in town.
I am not a werewolf.

Oh... I thought... well, you’re welcome to stay and have some cupcakes! Paul turns and leaves bitterly, along with his wife.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 68. GRANDMA LINDA (CONT’D) Anyone else? I made them special for Mavis. The cupcakes’ frosting is a gross eyeball design. Mavis smiles politely. Johnny's brother Brett enters with COZY, a sweet cocker spaniel who gently kisses Johnny.
We're back from the senior home!
Cozy! How’s my sweet girl? Cozy sees Mavis and attacks her, pouncing barking and nip crazily.
Whoa! Cozy, no! Johnny pulls Cozy off.
Oh, dear, I forgot, Cozy has a monster phobia. Just hates them. Cozy dives onto Pandragora, who isn’t fazed.
Ah, that’s cool. I get it.
We better tie her up. And to think she’s a therapy dog! Brett takes Cozy away, still barking at Mavis, who mainta her forced smile. Cozy bursts loose and goes nuts in the distance.
Aaugh! I said I’m not a werewolf!
PAN DOWN to reveal a CAMPFIRE. All the little Vampire Kid are singing around it, led by Dana on guitar.

head_text.subj: EVEN IN THE BRIGHTEST SUNNY WEATHER

text: (MORE )
HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 69.
(hands in the air) Yay!!!
Great job, vampires, give yourselves a hug! As the kids hug themselves, reveal Murray and Frankenstei sitting in the circle hugging themselves as when. Dracula walks over and nudges them.
We're going.
What? Where?
As we hear another campfire song in the distance, Dracula climbs the tower holding Dennis as»the others follow.
Why are we doing this?
You'd rather be listening to those putrid new songs? What happened to “Michael Row, Your Corpse Ashore”? Or “Kill-baya”? (singing) Someone's oozing pus, my lord... Kill-baya...
We shouldn’t be up here, Drac.
Who’s ready to fly?
Me! Me! Like a superhero!
This thing is rickety, maybe the kid isn’t supposed to fly-- They have reached the top of the tower.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 70.
Quiet! This is how they learn. You throw them and they figure it out. It’s how my father taught me!
I wanna fly now!
Attabat! You know Papa’s right here if you need him! Griffin removes his glasses.
I can’t watch this.
Please don’t.
Here... We...... go! Dracula tosses smiling Dennis off the tower. Everyone is horrified except for beaming, calm Dracula. We hear Denni
Wheeeeeeeeee! Dracula remains calm.,The others start taking peeks.
He’s still, not flying.
He will.
(slightly more distant) Wheeeeeee!
Still not.
It‘’ll happen. Beat. A very faint “wheeee”.
This is a tall tower.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 71.
That's why it’s good.
You should get him.
He’s gonna fall to his death.
He’s taking his time. We can hear Dennis screaming.
Drac!
I did that my first time. More screaming. All but Dracula are beside themselves.
He’s getting close to the ground. More screaming. Beat.

You know what, he’s not gonna fly. Dracula shoots out of frame in a flash. As a bat, he flie Dennis as we reveal all the campers shooting with their smartphones as they watch him fall. Dracula swoops and catches Dennis one foot before impact, flying a triumphan loop-de-loop, afterwards.
I told you, Papa’s always here for you.
Yay, Papa! Again! They land as Dana frantically approaches them.
Oh dear. Oh my devil. We’re gonna have to report this.
You mean to the papers? I guess it was pretty cool. But I’m not about getting press.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 72.
No, sir, I mean the authorities. I can’t not report child endangerment.
Whoa, listen to me! That was fun! Your singing is child abuse.
ANGLE ON the top of the tower.
Should we go down and help him?

Nope. I told him this was nuts. He’s on his own. Frankenstein acts bored and leans against the rail. In the distant background, we see the tall tower. It is starting to tilt on the side Frank is leaning.
I’m gonna need some information.
Nobody needs to know about this.
We have to call the boy’s mother. The tower is slowly starting to fall.
What? No, that ain’t happening.
I have to follow protocol.
(quickly hypnotizing) You will not follow protocol.
I’m a vampire. Can’t be hypnotized.
(giving up) Oh. Right. Tower falling more. We can faintly see some frenetic acti at the top of the tower.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 73.
Now, please, give me her phone number. Don’t make me call the police. The Camp Kids start screaming as the tower comes closer.

No one’s calling nobody! Suddenly the tower slams to the ground, landing right on campfire! Frank catches fire and goes insane as everyone scatters. Wayne and Murray chase and scream at Frank, try to get him to calm down. Frank screams in terror and runs aimlessly through different buildings, setting them, and hearse, on fire. EXT. JOHNNY’S PARENTS HOUSE - ROOFTOP - MOMENTS LATER On the ROOF, Mavis and Johnny sit pensively.,We can faint hear “Monster Mash” coming from inside the house.
Sorry about all the songs. I guess they thought you’d like it.
Why do I feel so weird being here?
No, hon, they’re being weird.

Really? I don’t know anything. Famous songs, Slurpées. I can’t believe all the stuff I’ve missed living inside that hotel. At least if Dennis grows up away from Transylvania, he won’t be weird like me.
Are you nuts? Mavis. You're a blast. You’re so full of life, and curious about everything. If Dennis grows up to be just like you I’1l be the luckiest dad in the world.

I love you, Johnny Stein. They start to kiss...  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 74. MAVIS (CONT’D) You know what? As long as we’re all together we'll be happy anywhere. Even the hotel. Johnny steals a quiet “yessss” before they kiss.
Our monsters have landed here. Frankenstein and Murray in separate cell with two CELLMATES on the lower bunks.
What’d I tell you guys. Fire bad. Fire. Bad. Frank climbs to a top bunk as one skinny, creepy weird CELLMATE smiles menacingly at Murray, who’s terrified.
Well, well. Looks like we got some fresh toilet paper.

Drac...how ‘bout gettin’ us out of here before this guy does something inappropriate? PAN to DRACULA'S CELL, he’s in with Wayne and Dennis, who looks a bit worried forthe first time, a little teary eye
You know we have to obey human laws now.
Are we bad guys, Papa Drac?
No, no, no, Denisovich, you could never be a bad guy. You’re the nicest boy in the world! We're just playing pretend here, and you’re -
Batman!
Uh, yes...the Batman, and I’m the bad guy and you are locking me in jail.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 75.
Cebause Batman’s the toughest and strongest guy in the world.
Uh, yes. He’s...the man.
Get in that jail bad guy! Cebause I’m Batman and you’ll never excape!
Oh, no! Don’t hurt me, Batman!
You better be good! Or Murray's gonna sit on you!
(laughing) Oh, no! Not the mega-tushy! Noooo!
What’s this now? As Dennis laughs, Dracula hears a faint sound from his ph and takes it out.
What? It’s Mavis??
Hang up! You must've butt-dialed her.
Why would my butt do that to me?
Murray's tushy did it! EXT. JOHNNY’S PARENTS HOUSE - ROOFTOP - CONTINUOUS Mavis takes her ringing phone, sees Dracula’s number. It disconnects. She is puzzled.
She’s gonna call back!! The phone starts ringing.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 76.
Okay. Don’t panic. There’s an app that can help us here.
Who’s an app?
(scrolling) I just need a picture of the hotel. Ah! Got it! Looka that! Wayne shows Dracula that they are keyed into the backgrou photo of the hotel.
That’s insane, man! It’s like voodoo stuff.
What are you playing with?
This is the best, Denisovich! Now we're going to play where we pretend we’re at home! We’re gonna play with Mommy, she loves this game! Okay??
Yay! More pretend! Dracula answers the phone innocently. INTERCUT with Mavis the roof.
Yes! Hello?
Hi Mommy!
Hi Dennis! My little everything! I love you! Are you having fun?
Yes! We’re having fun, at home!
Yes! We’re watching Cakey the Cake Monster on the TV!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 77.
Hey shut up! Tryin’ to sleep here!
Heh! That’s the TV show..?
That doesn’t sound like Cakey...
That's Cakey’s, eh, friend, Mr. Sleepy! Dracula quickly waves his finger causing Frankenstein's t bunk to collapse on his Cellmate in the lower bunk.
(aside to Wayne) Where’s the volume button? Dracula looks but accidentally hits the wrong button.
No, no, no. Their background changes to a beach, a stock image from t app.
What’s going yon?
Nothing, we’re home. Wayne frantically grabs the phone and scrolls. They appea be in front of a rollercoaster now.
You are not home!
(waving his hands) Ha ha! Yay! Rollercoaster!
Where are you?

Ehh...a rollercoaster...whee! Dracula and Wayne desperately wave their hands and shake their faces like they’re absorbing the force of a rollercoaster as Dennis grabs the phone.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 78.
I wanna play! Dennis scrolls it this time...and pulls up the real image the jail cell! But Dracula and Wayne are oblivious, continuing as if they’re on the fake rollercoaster.
What are you doing?!
Heh... we're rollercoastering.
Look! Jail!
Jail??
(realizing, covering) Heh, look at that! He’s pretending he’s in jail! Suddenly, Murray crashes through, half torn up and crying
He wiped with me! He wiped with me!

I am coming home right now. And you better be there! Or I swear, Dad, you're gonna be very sorry! Mavis hangs up the phone and immediately runs down the wa of the house, hyperventilating. Johnny struggles to climb down quickly.
What’s going on?!
I think Dad and Dennis are in jail!
Whhhaaat?
We need to get home right away!
Okay. I’1l go wake up my backpack!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 79.
Gimme that! Dracula grabs the phone from Wayne and dials, digging his long fingernails into the phone.
A phone in mid-air rings. It’s Griffin, who managed to av being arrested. He speaks quietly as he’s “hiding” outsid
Yeah?
It’s time to break human laws. Griffin sighs and removes his glasses.
As we hear Griffin nervously moan, a FLOATING KEY opens t door to the cells. It floats past the oblivious DEPUTY, wearing headphones and listening to the same pop tune.
What the -- ? The cellmate pushes Murray aside but appears to be slappe the face, left, then right, then kicked in the nuts by Gr as everyone else hustles out. The Deputy finally notices.
Hey! Griffin tickles the Deputy, who is helpless with laughter the others get away. They run over to a dirt road...
You called the getaway car? Just then, pulling up in his Rascal scooter, is the Blob, intact but covered with dirt and grass. A stray SQUIRREL trapped in his body.
(scolds them in blob jibberish)  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 80.
I’m sorry, Blob, we really meant to call you sooner! They all pile on to the scooter and somehow the Blob is a to drive it, awkwardly, but still fairly fast. Dracula co up for daylight.
Mavis and Johnny arriving at the airport. They run up to TICKET COUNTER.
You want to go where?
Transylvania. Preferably an aisle seat.
We don’t fly direct to Transylvania. You can go to Bucharest but you’1l switch planes in Chicago, and then Zurich.
So when would we get there?
Well, the Chicago flight’s delayed due to bad weather. Mavis suddenly makes the same crazy ROAR FACE her Dad mak The Ticket Agent is unfazed. TICKET AGENT (CONT’D) So two seats in Coach?
No!! Mavis, in hero pose, pulls out her poncho.
(stunned) No.
Yes.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 81.

Mavis, in poncho and transformed into a bat, lifts Johnny backpack, luggage, and all, into the sky and flies ahead. INTERCUT the MAD RACE to get back to the Hotel. - Scooter rolling along, turning sharply as everyone hold on. - Mavis bat desperately flying Johnny over Quebec.
Whoa! Quebec! One time in my hostel I got bit by a centipede and totally threw up.
Sounds cool... - Scooter hits traffic. The other drivers don’t stare.
Come on, Blobby! Squeeze through!
Why are you mad, Papa Drac?
Oh, I just want to get home. I miss Mommy and Daddy so much.
I miss Mommy and Daddy! And I miss -
You miss who? You miss that Winnie?
Yeah. But we’re just friends.

(chuckling) Sure, Ladykiller, that’s how it always starts. (noticing traffic) Come on! Squeeze already!! - Mavis heroically dodging lightning as the weather worse Johnny whoops excitedly and notices Dublin, Ireland.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 82.
That’s Dublin! One time I roomed with this Croatian dude who carried around a stuffed animal in a cage. Freaky.
Trying to concentrate...
Gotcha. - Traffic has cleared, but Blob needs to stop for a minut
(jibberish)
Now? When we finally have no traffic? You're killing me, Blobby!

(angry jibberish) Dracula waits, annoyed, as the Blob pees into some bushes - A raincloud. Mavis and Johnny emerge, sopping wet, Mavi unshaken, Johnny celebrates but falls. Mavis catches him. - Dracula in slow scooter looking at his watch. He makes everyone get off.
We're never gonna make it! Frank, blow! Frankenstein grabs the Blob by the mouth and blows him up like a balloon - bigger and bigger as everyone climbs on

Now! Frankenstein holds Blob’s mouth shut and jumps on, finall letting go. As air comes out of his mouth the Blob flies superspeed with everyone hanging on. - SUNSET - Mavis and Johnny finally see the HOTEL in the distance and Mavis’ POV frantically scans for Dennis. As the air gets less the Blob starts flying wildly like a deflating balloon but somehow he lands at the hotel. They the ground hard and roll, then pop up perfectly all toget  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 83. Dracula proudly starts to video chat Mavis. He sees her f on the phone, it’s angry.
So, hey, when are you gonna get here already? We've been waiting - He looks up. REVEAL Mavis waiting for him at the entrance with Johnny.
Give me my son.

We just went out for some rolled oats with apricot. Mavis angrily holds up her smartphone and plays a Youtube clip titled “Miracle Rescue at Vampire Camp” with over 2 million hits. In the clip, Dennis is clearly falling from tower, screaming, before getting caught by Dracula. Busted, Dracula hands Dennis over.
Please don’t leave.

Why couldn’t you just accept who he is, Dad? We’ll have his birthday party here on Wednesday. Then we’re going. Dracula looks down, lost. His friends don’t know what to to him. INT. DRACULA’S BEDROOM - LATER Dracula stands teary eyed by the painting of Martha.
I’m so sorry, my darling. What have I done? Dracula goes to sit on his coffin.
Why couldn’t I just let things -- Dracula feels something in his coffin and jumps up.
Gaaaah!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 84. Johnny reveals himself hiding under the blankets.
(quietly) Is Mavis around?
What?? No! What are you doing? Johnny immediately hugs him desperately.
Please get me out of this!
What? What, what?
I don’t wanna leave the hotel! And you! And neither does Dennis!
He doesn’t? I knew it!
Help us, Drac! I don't wanna go home! They want to me to get a job! At my Dad’s office! I don’t know what he does! But you have to wear shoes!! +e * HF Now he is crying. He looks at his sneakers.
You're my bestest kicks! Don’t leave my feet!
Okay, okay. Stop talking to your sneakers. I’m trying to think here! *
You stop! You didn’t have to do this, man. She was ready to stay! And I’ve been killing it helping this hotel! Have you seen the new band! ?

Johnny and Dracula watch from the rear as a young ZOMBIE BAND appears in a cloud of smoke on the BANDSTAND.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 85. A Zombie Boy Band! Whooo! The Zombie Boy Band dances and grunts in beautiful harmon S storm the stage and dance with joy. Only the Zombie * Composers are bitter.
Awesome band, Johnny!
(choking up) Soon I won't be here to witness all the good I’ve done. And I'll be wearing shoes.
This cannot happen. For any of us. * But there’s one last way I can fix * this before Denisovich turns 5. *
